data.question: What is the ferroelectric transition temperature of [Mn3(HCOO)6](C2H5OH)?
At what temperature does [Mn3(HCOO)6](C2H5OH) exhibit a ferrimagnetic transition?
How were [Mn3(HCOO)6](C2H5OH) crystals obtained?
data.answer: By keeping [Mn3(HCOO)6] crystals in ethanol vapor for several days.

data.question: What is the weight loss percentage observed for [Mn3(HCOO)6](C2H5OH) between 30-100 °C?
Is [Mn3(HCOO)6](C2H5OH) considered the first ferroelectric, porous molecular crystal?
Does the crystal structure of [Mn3(HCOO)6](C2H5OH) change significantly between 90 K and 190 K?
Can the guest molecules in [Mn3(HCOO)6](C2H5OH) be easily removed under vacuum and/or by heating?
What is the role of Mn2+ ions in [Mn3(HCOO)6](C2H5OH)?
data.answer: They are responsible for the magnetic properties of the crystal.

data.question: Why was reexamination needed for the ethanol-containing crystal [Mn3(HCOO)6](C2H5OH)?
data.answer: Because of the large escaping tendency of the guest ethanol molecule at around room temperature.

data.question: What method was used to perform magnetic measurements of [Mn3(HCOO)6](C2H5OH)?
Was the dielectric behavior of [Mn3(HCOO)6](C2H5OD) significantly different from [Mn3(HCOO)6](C2H5OH)?
What was the maximum dielectric constant (εr) observed for [Mn3(HCOO)6](C2H5OH)?
Do ferroelectric and ferrimagnetic orders coexist in [Mn3(HCOO)6](C2H5OH) below 8.5 K?
What does the presence of a sharp peak at 165 K in the dielectric measurements of [Mn3(HCOO)6](C2H5OH) indicate?
What is the significance of the guest molecules in the ferroelectric properties of [Mn3(HCOO)6](C2H5OH)?
data.answer: The ferroelectric properties mainly come from the guest molecules.

data.question: Is the guest-free [Mn3(HCOO)6] crystal temperature-dependent in its dielectric constant?
data.answer: No, it shows a very small and almost temperature-independent dielectric constant.

data.question: What does the observed weight loss in TGA measurement of [Mn3(HCOO)6](C2H5OH) correspond to?
data.answer: The calculated weight loss of one ethanol molecule.

data.question: What is the crystal system of [Mn3(HCOO)6](C2H5OH)?
Does the crystal structure of [Mn3(HCOO)6](C2H5OH) have one-dimensional channels along the b-axis?
What is the purpose of using silver conducting paste in the dielectric measurements of [Mn3(HCOO)6](C2H5OH)?
data.answer: It was used as the electrode.
